title: Germany, France to discuss response to nerve agent attack in UK-Merkel
text: March 16, 2018 / 5:30 PM / Updated 17 minutes ago Germany, France to discuss response to nerve agent attack in UK-Merkel Reuters Staff 1 Min Read PARIS, March 16 (Reuters) - German Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Friday she would discuss with French President Emmanuel Macron an appropriate response to an attack using a military-grade nerve agent that Britain has blamed on Russia. “Many trails point to the fact that Russia is responsible,” Merkel said before talks with Macron in Paris. “It is a very difficult situation and today we will discuss what the appropriate response is.” (Reporting by Ingrid Melander, Writing by Joseph Nasr, Editing by William Maclean)
